snippet: Stock indexes showed slight gains in light trading as a robust jobs report continued to raise questions over how soon a government economic stimulus program would taper off.
abstract: Stock indexes show slight gains in light trading as a robust jobs report continues to raise questions over how soon a government economic stimulus program will taper off.
lead_paragraph: Stock indexes showed slight gains in light trading as a robust jobs report continued to raise questions over how soon a government economic stimulus program would taper off.

headline.main: Market Drifts Upward As Eyes Turn to Fed
